base_description: Tall, rectangular red cabinet with silver frame.
part_description: Two vertical doors, silver frame, four legs, flat top. Doors are centrally positioned and cover the front. Frame outlines the cabinet, legs at each corner.
internal_interaction_description: The doors are hinged to the frame, allowing them to swing open and closed. The frame provides structural support, holding the doors and top securely. The legs elevate the cabinet, distributing weight evenly across the base.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can store items inside, accessed by opening the doors. Its height and shape allow it to fit against walls in rooms. The color and design may complement or contrast with surrounding decor, impacting aesthetic appeal.
